Title: VidCoder
Description: VidCoder is a DVD/Blu-ray ripping and video transcoding application. It uses HandBrake for the encoding engine, but has a revamped and easy to use UI written in WPF.
HomeWiki:
VidCoder has moved to vidcoder.net !

Source is now hosted on GitHub.

Codeplex was nice while it was being maintained, but I have had to answer one too many CAPTCHAs. I'll keep up old releases but I won't be posting anything more here. See you on the flip side!
